original: Österblom, Erik Konrad Mattias, landsfiskal, Bräkne-Hoby, f. 2:5/2/04 i Hällieberga, Kronob. 1., av ryttm. F. Ö. o. Anna Carlsson. G. 34 m. Inez Månsson. Barn: Ann-Gret f. 34, Bengt 38, Ulf 43. — Landsfiskalsex. 25. Res. t. Tyskl., Tjeckoslov. 29, Norge f. stud. av rättegångsförfar. 46. E. landskansl. 24, e. landsfiskal 31, landsfiskal i Hoby distr. fr. 32. V. ordf. i Smål. Banks avd :kont. 42, ordf. i Hoby G. o. IF 35, i Hoby skyttefören. 40, v. ordf. i Blek. fotb-.förb. 45, styrded. där fr. 38, Blek. gymn:förb. 37, hälsoviförb. 42, skytte-förb. 41, ordf. i Bräkne-Hoby byggn:-nd 3’3, hälsov:nd 38. Hobbies: idr., jakt, fiske. Hoby G. o. IFs GM, Blek. idrrförb. SM, ftjt i silver, Blek. jakt-v:fören. SM, Sv. jägiförb. hed:t i silv., idr:m., skidl:m., skytteim., alla i guld.
translated:
Translation: 

Österblom, Erik Konrad Mattias, district prosecutor, Bräkne-Hoby, born on 2nd May 1904 in Hällieberga, Kronob. 1st child of Captain F. Österblom and Anna Carlsson. Married in 1934 to Inez Månsson. Children: Ann-Gret, born in 1934, Bengt in 1938, Ulf in 1943. - District prosecutor since 1925. Travelled to Germany and Czechoslovakia in 1929, and Norway for studying legal procedures in 1946. Employed as a county chancery clerk from 1924, a district prosecutor from 1931, and as a district prosecutor in the Hoby district since 1932. Vice Chairman of Småland Bank's department: account in 1942, Chairman of Hoby Sports Club and IF (sports association) since 1935, Chairman of Hoby Shooting Association in 1940, Vice Chairman of Blekinge Football Association in 1945, served on the board there since 1938, member of Blekinge Gymnastics Association since 1937, Regional Health Association since 1942, Shooting Association since 1941, Chairman of the Bräkne-Hoby building committee in 1933, and Health Committee in 1938. Hobbies: sports, hunting, fishing. Awarded the GM (Gold Medal) by Hoby Sports Club and IF, SM (Gold Medal) by Blekinge Sports Association, silver FTJT by Blekinge hunting association, Swedish hunter's association honored in silver, awarded medals in sports, skiing, shooting, all in gold.

structured.name: Erik Konrad Mattias Österblom
